body:
HI I'm Jefferson from Los Angeles, CA. I like... to play and listen to music.
 I'm not the most active on MC, but I like to play for fun. I talk a lot too.

title: Hi, I'm JSprkz

replies.body: Hello, welcome to Avicus. If you have any questions/concerns, feel free to email support@avicus.net or ask a staff member in game, we are happy to help. I hope you enjoy your time and to familiarise yourself with the rules, visit https://avicus.net/rules.

replies.body:
Hey JSprkz,

Nice to see you on Avicus forums! Like Cammy said, if you have any questions/concerns be sure to ask a staff member or email support. If you need someone to talk to, add me on Skype: mytrueneverest

Hope to see you around in game more ^-^!
